letters.description: Uncover the patient’s clinical history, genetic predispositions, and environmental triggers through comprehensive intake and functional testing.
Map symptoms and pathology onto the Functional Medicine Matrix to identify core physiological imbalances and systemic connections.
Implement foundational lifestyle modifications including personalized nutrition, restorative sleep, and stress modulation to stabilize the internal environment.
Address specific biological dysfunctions using evidence-based nutraceuticals and targeted protocols to restore cellular and metabolic harmony.
Develop a long-term wellness plan focused on health span, resilience, and patient empowerment to prevent the recurrence of chronic dysfunction.
